titles.title: Tennessee Valley Authority Transparency Act of 2025
Tennessee Valley Authority Transparency Act of 2025
Tennessee Valley Authority Transparency Act of 2025
Tennessee Valley Authority Transparency Act of 2025
Tennessee Valley Authority Transparency Act of 2025
To require certain meetings of the Tennessee Valley Authority to be transparent and open to the public, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 119-140.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 109.

action.text: Mr. Ezell moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1373.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
